forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning changing to rain showers late. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. A few flurries are possible. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. A few flurries are possible. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with afternoon snow showers. High -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow showers developing in the afternoon. High near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will transition to snow showers during the afternoon. High -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 18F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers later in the day. High around 30F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later at night. Low 23F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of light snow. High 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with some light snow. High 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 32F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
